mosinstall.name: ezine
mosinstall.author: DesignForJoomla.com
mosinstall.description:
If you have ever used Joomla CMS, you may noticed that the default Joomla FrontPage has a blog layout presentation technique of combining contents from sections/categories all together and presenting them in one solid peace. This format is awkward and inappropriate for complex content presentation, especially in the cases of news portal or online magazines. That is why we created D4J eZine Component, the next generation of Joomla content presentation in flexible and elegance fashion.

In short, eZine allows you to separate all content items to multiple categories and present them in multiple pages with individual layout. By using eZine you are no longer restricted by Joomla default plain blog positioning technique. You are now able to present maximum contents in a elegance and flexible fashion.

eZine can help you to use maximum space of the page. Moreover, you can have as many such pages as you want. Just imagine what you could do if you are able to have multiple "frontpages" with truely individual content on each.

For more information please take a visit to our website http://designforjoomla.com

queries.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__ezine_page` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `menu_name` varchar(30) NOT NULL default '', `page_title` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `published` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `params` text NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) TYPE=MyISAM;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__ezine_category` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `pageid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `contentid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `content_type` varchar(30) NOT NULL default '', `ordering` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `published` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `params` text NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY ( `id` ) ) TYPE=MyISAM;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__ezine_separator` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `type` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `content_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `html_code` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY ( `id` ) ) TYPE=MyISAM;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__ezine_newsletter_contents` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `page_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `date_created` DATETIME NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `already_send` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `date_sent` DATETIME NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `content` longtext NOT NULL default '', `params` text NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY ( `id` ) ) TYPE=MyISAM;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__ezine_newsletter_users` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `name` varchar(50) NOT NULL default '', `email` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `date_join` DATETIME NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `subcribed_pages` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY ( `id` ) ) TYPE=MyISAM;
DELETE FROM `#__modules` WHERE title = 'eZineMenu' AND module = 'mod_mainmenu'
